Title: Requires the superintendent of financial services to examine the green bank at least once every calendar year
Summary: Requires the superintendent of financial services to examine the Green Bank at least once every calendar year; requires that a copy of such examination shall be furnished to NYSERDA, the state comptroller, the senate and the assembly.
LawCode: Add ยง1859-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the examination of the Green Bank
